artefact: Find your lost theory test pass certificate number

artefact.overview: Find your theory test pass certificate number if you have lost yours and need it to book or manage your practical test
artefact.more_information:
To find your lost theory test pass certificate number you'll need your:

- valid Great Britain or Northern Ireland driving licence number
- date of birth

You can read the [Data Protection Act 1998 - Fair Processing Notice](/dsa-theory-test-booking-service-data-protection "Data Protection Act 1998 - Fair Processing Notice") for the Driving Standards Agency before you start finding your certificate number.
artefact.introduction: You can find your theory test pass certificate number if you've lost your original letter - you'll need it when you book your practical test, and might need it if you change or cancel your practical test.

artefact.title: Driving tests and learning to drive

details.description: Includes booking a test, changing and cancelling tests, rules and fees

Book your driving test or get a tax disc online, find out the legal requirements for buying, owning, importing or scrapping a car or motorcycle, and read about your rights and responsibilities as a driver.

artefact.title: Change the date of your practical driving test
